mapper.select: SELECT a.SEQ, a.TITLE, a.MEMO, u.YNAME, a.REGDT, a.UPDDT FROM tb_memo a, tb_yuser u WHERE a.YID = u.YID AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_memo SET title = #{title}, memo = #{memo}, upddt = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_memo(title, memo, memo_type, use_cl, public_level, use_type, depth, super_seq, yid, regdt, upddt) VALUES (#{title}, #{memo}, '00', 'Y', '0', '', 0, null, #{yid}, NOW(), NOW())
